about_the_game:
One Perfect Day is an immersive first-person adventure game where you help Andy escape a mysterious time loop.

By solving engaging puzzles and exploring different time periods, you’ll uncover the secrets of Andy's past. Use unique tools and cherished mementos to piece together his story, discovering what really happened and what could have been.

Dive into a gripping narrative of self-discovery and healing, perfect for anyone who loves a good mystery and wants to experience a heartfelt journey. No gaming expertise required—just a curious mind and a love for a great story.

Key Features

  • Enjoy casual mini-activities that tickle the mind and warm the heart.
  • Talk to and listen in on conversations and gossip among your fellow classmates.
  • Solve non-linear chronological puzzles like a true time looper would.
  • Bask in calming visuals and ASMR ambiences of a dreamy school environment.

content_descriptors.notes:
Please note that this game contains sensitive and emotionally challenging content that addresses themes of suicide and child abuse. The narrative may explore difficult and distressing situations, which could potentially trigger strong emotional responses in players.

The story aims to approach these topics with empathy and seriousness, shedding light on the impact they have on individuals and society. It is essential to prioritize your mental well-being while engaging with the game. If you feel overwhelmed or distressed, consider taking breaks, seeking support from loved ones, or accessing professional resources.

Player discretion is advised, and we encourage those who may find these themes triggering or uncomfortable to consider their emotional readiness before proceeding with the game. Remember, your mental health and well-being are of utmost importance, and it's okay to step away if needed.

If you or someone you know is struggling with mental health issues or has experienced abuse, please seek help from a qualified mental health professional or a helpline dedicated to providing support and resources in your country.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 or higher.
  • Processor: 1.80GHz dual core processor.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM.
  • Sound Card: Yes (Headphones recommended)

short_description: A slow burn thriller about a boy who finds himself reliving a particular day of his life at school. Encompassed in a first person narrative rich puzzle adventure, players help Andy rediscover his past, future and present by solving the mystery that revolves around this one perfect day.
